results.content: The course gave me a good understanding of Bootstrap 3, it was useful to understand how to troubleshoot issues.

results.content: Great for beginners, I learned some valuable information about text editors and shortcuts within them.  Projects are visually appealing and the content is easy to understand. I find myself using this as a point of reference for my own projects.
results.content_html: Great for beginners, I learned some valuable information about text editors and shortcuts within them. Projects are visually appealing and the content is easy to understand. I find myself using this as a point of reference for my own projects.

results.content: The courses is a little slow, but the instructor seem to know what he is talking about. I do love bootstrap and plan on getting more courses like these.
results.content_html: The courses is a little slow, but the instructor seem to know what he is talking about. I do love bootstrap and plan on getting more courses like these.

results.content: The presenter was good and had a nice style. It had a lot of bootstrap concepts and examples which were very good. Only down sides were the styles themselves were not too great and repeating CSS code a lot instead of refactoring it.

results.content: It would have been nice if you would have showed how to add images that are in folders on your computer.  But other than that it was a good job,  Thank you!

results.content: I like how he presents the course!  The instructor does a GREAT job explaining each topic.  I really have learned so much!
results.content_html: I like how he presents the course! The instructor does a GREAT job explaining each topic. I really have learned so much!

results.content: Great course and a great, often humorous, tutor :) Was a bit unsure at first of the teaching style... But it is actually very concise, getting down to the fundamentals straight away (not too much 'fluffing') and everything is well explained. It's great to have projects to work alongside the learning. All in all, very glad I bought the course - would recommend to anyone with no experience of Bootstrap and looking for a whistle-stop-tour of it!
results.content_html: Great course and a great, often humorous, tutor :) Was a bit unsure at first of the teaching style... But it is actually very concise, getting down to the fundamentals straight away (not too much 'fluffing') and everything is well explained. It's great to have projects to work alongside the learning. All in all, very glad I bought the course - would recommend to anyone with no experience of Bootstrap and looking for a whistle-stop-tour of it!

results.content: So far I love this course.  The best part of it is the instructor.  Even though it is a video course, he comes across as very personable and understanding.  If you are already know HTML, CSS and file organization, this this course is easy to follow in order to learn Bootstrap.
